participant_abstract.sent: The final meeting was mainly concerned with showing the first prototype of the new remote, i feel our ideas were well accepted.

There was a final discussion about how we felt the team worked and it was decided that we did it better as a team, though working apart between meetings allowed us to compose separate solutions to the problem in hand.

participant_actions.sent: Send completed design to Head of Department.

participant_decisions.sent: Changed from double curved to single curved.

participant_problems.sent: Since our product was running over budget we had to make the desision to cut the voice recognition system that we had included in the prototype.
Did we combat the problem of RSI?
